name: Clerky
headline: Makes legal paperwork easy for startups and their attorneys.
description: Clerky builds software to make legal paperwork easier for startups and their attorneys.  From formation to fundraising to hiring - everything a startup needs.  Thousands of top startups use Clerky to get legal paperwork done safely and efficiently.

founders.name: Chris Field, Founder
founders.description: I'm a co-founder of Clerky. I was a startup attorney at Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP. Before becoming an attorney, I worked in various management and operations roles at TippingPoint Technologies and Micron Electronics. I studied electrical engineering and history at Stanford University and I studied law at the University of Pennsylvania.

founders.name: Darby Wong, Founder/CEO
founders.description: I'm a co-founder and the CEO of Clerky. I was a startup attorney at Orrick Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP and have a law degree from Harvard Law School. Prior to law school, I majored in computer science at the University of Washington, where I worked on machine learning research.

# How the Best StartupsGet Legal Paperwork Done
# How the BestStartups Get Legal Paperwork Done
Clerky is the only online legal service obsessed with helping startup founders get legal paperwork done safely. Get your legal paperwork done with confidence, so you can get back to building your startup.
[Get Started](https://www.clerky.com/<https:/app.clerky.com/signup>)
## Form & Go Further
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8da7_icon_formation.svg)
Form
Glide through the startup formation process safely. Get important features that online legal services typically miss.
### Incorporation
Incorporate as a Delaware C corporation, the standard for high-growth startups. Typically processed by the Delaware Secretary of State within 1-3 business days.
[Get Started](https://www.clerky.com/<#>)[Learn More](https://www.clerky.com/</startups/products#formation>)
20,000+ Startups Incorporated!
Advanced Delay Protection
Exclusive
100% accurate name availability check
Expert rejection analysis and response
Exclusive
**What if you need to change something later?**
Use our Maintenance products to change your corporation's name or increase authorized shares. Separate fees apply.
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d8c_arrow-down.svg)
### Post-Incorporation Setup
Issue stock to founders with customizable vesting, elect directors, appoint officers, adopt bylaws, and protect your startup's intellectual property.
Best-Practice 83(b) Election Support
Pre-Filled Forms & Filing Instructions
Automated Filing Reminders
Premium Filing & Evidence Service
Exclusive
Paid Add-On
Exclusive
**What if you need to change something later?**
Use our Maintenance products to change officers and directors, add new co-founders, and more. Separate fees may apply.
[](https://www.clerky.com/</startup-products#post-incorporation-setup>)
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d8c_arrow-down.svg)
[Foreign QualificationExclusiveCalifornia • New York](https://www.clerky.com/</startup-products#foreign-qualification>)[Stock Plan Adoption](https://www.clerky.com/</startup-products#stock-plan-adoption>)
[EIN Application for Non-US FoundersCompletely online, no fax machine needed. 100% in-house, not outsourced.](https://www.clerky.com/</startup-products#ein-application>)[Apply for Corporate Bank AccountNo EIN NeededThe most popular banks for startups. Pre-filled applications make it as easy as possible.](https://www.clerky.com/</startup-products#bank-account>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8da8_icon_further.svg)
Go Further
By forming your startup on Clerky, you're setting it up with lifetime access to best-in-class software, products, and support.
[FundraisingBoard Consents • Safes • Convertible Notes Valuation Cap • Discount • MFN](https://www.clerky.com/</startup-products#fundraising>)[CommercialOne-Way NDAs • Mutual NDAs](https://www.clerky.com/</startup-products#commercial>)[MaintenanceChange Officers • Change Directors • Change Company Name • Increase Authorized Shares](https://www.clerky.com/</startup-products#maintenance>)[HiringNew Hire PaperworkOffer Letters • Consulting Agreements • Advisor Agreements • Confidential Information and Invention Assignment AgreementsEquity CompensationRestricted Stock Issuances • Stock Option Issuances (Regular and Early Exercisable)](https://www.clerky.com/</startups/products#hiring>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d61_icon_custom.svg)
Customizable
Every startup is different. Our software makes it easy to customize the key terms of the legal paperwork you're working on. If you need, you can even customize the underlying form language for nearly complete flexibility.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d5f_icon_collaborate-cofounder.svg)
Collaborative
We're much more than fill-in-the-blank forms. With Clerky, you can easily loop in your attorney to have them review and comment on the information you're entering. Add your co-founders to your team so you can all stay on the same page and get legal paperwork done together.
## Trusted by Experts
"We keep close tabs on the services our clients use, and **Clerky is uniquely focused on making sure that things are done correctly — that's really important for avoiding expensive problems down the line**."
![logo gd](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d9d_logo_gd.png)
Lou Soto
Partner at Gunderson Dettmer Stough Villeneuve Franklin & Hachigian, LLP
**"When Y Combinator funds an unincorporated startup, I send the founders to Clerky and know everything will be done correctly."**
![logo y combinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d74_logo_y-combinator.svg)
Kirsty Nathoo
Partner at Y Combinator
"**Clerky is the highest quality online solution for standard company documentation I've seen** , especially for startups that are looking to get set up in a way that is ready for financing."
![logo vlp](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d9c_logo_vlp.png)
David Goldenberg
Founding Partner at VLP Law Group, LLP
"**The difference between clients who arrive to us having used a shitty lawyer v. those who used Clerky is night and day.** Well done @darbyw and @chrisfield5. Public service."
![logo optimal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d9b_logo_optimal.png)
José Ancer
Partner and CTO at Optimal Counsel
"Everyone knows about Clerky for formation already, but their fundraising and hiring products are equally impressive. **Some other services claim to have those too, but they end up causing legal problems because the quality isn't there. Building these products correctly requires a skill set that is unique to Clerky.** "
![logo orrick](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d9e_logo_orrick.png)
John Bautista
Partner at Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP (and advisor to Clerky)
"There are a lot of online services out there that can quickly create legal documents, but **Clerky stands out for combining that ease-of-use with a focus on helping startups get everything done the right way**. From what we've seen with our clients who have come to SLS post-formation, **there's no other online service that is as effective at helping founders avoid problems with due diligence**."
![logo sls](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8da0_logo_sls.png)
Andre Gharakhanian
Partner at Silicon Legal Strategy
## Run by Startup Attorneys
![photo of chris and darby](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d6f_photo_founders%20\(1\).png)
We're not a law firm and we're not your attorney. But we are run by startup attorneys who worked at one of the top startup practices in Silicon Valley.‍Why is this important?We've seen first-hand how problems with legal paperwork can cost startups time and money. Our products are designed to help founders avoid these problems.
[Learn more about our story](https://www.clerky.com/</about>)
## You're in Good Company

## Founders Love Us
Clerky is one of the best products I have ever used. It has been incredibly beneficial and Clerky's team has been unbelievably helpful. I can't say it strongly enough – if you are starting a company, use Clerky.

# How the Best StartupsGet Legal Paperwork Done
# How the BestStartups Get Legal Paperwork Done
Clerky is the only online legal service obsessed with helping startup founders get legal paperwork done safely. Get your legal paperwork done with confidence, so you can get back to building your startup.
Get Started⟨16⟩
## Form & Go Further
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8da7_icon_formation.svg)
Form
Glide through the startup formation process safely. Get important features that online legal services typically miss.
### Incorporation
Incorporate as a Delaware C corporation, the standard for high-growth startups. Typically processed by the Delaware Secretary of State within 1-3 business days.
Get Started⟨19⟩Learn More⟨3⟩
20,000+ Startups Incorporated!
Advanced Delay Protection
Exclusive
100% accurate name availability check
Expert rejection analysis and response
Exclusive
**What if you need to change something later?**
Use our Maintenance products to change your corporation's name or increase authorized shares. Separate fees apply.
![Down arrow⟨20⟩]
### Post-Incorporation Setup
Issue stock to founders with customizable vesting, elect directors, appoint officers, adopt bylaws, and protect your startup's intellectual property.
Best-Practice 83(b) Election Support
Pre-Filled Forms & Filing Instructions
Automated Filing Reminders
Premium Filing & Evidence Service
Exclusive
Paid Add-On
Exclusive
**What if you need to change something later?**
Use our Maintenance products to change officers and directors, add new co-founders, and more. Separate fees may apply.

Go Further
By forming your startup on Clerky, you're setting it up with lifetime access to best-in-class software, products, and support.
FundraisingBoard Consents • Safes • Convertible Notes Valuation Cap • Discount • MFN⟨25⟩CommercialOne-Way NDAs • Mutual NDAs⟨26⟩MaintenanceChange Officers • Change Directors • Change Company Name • Increase Authorized Shares⟨27⟩HiringNew Hire PaperworkOffer Letters • Consulting Agreements • Advisor Agreements • Confidential Information and Invention Assignment AgreementsEquity CompensationRestricted Stock Issuances • Stock Option Issuances (Regular and Early Exercisable)⟨5⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d61_icon_custom.svg)
Customizable
Every startup is different. Our software makes it easy to customize the key terms of the legal paperwork you're working on. If you need, you can even customize the underlying form language for nearly complete flexibility.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d39/64bfd4a79278e7a8fe5b8d5f_icon_collaborate-cofounder.svg)
Collaborative
We're much more than fill-in-the-blank forms. With Clerky, you can easily loop in your attorney to have them review and comment on the information you're entering. Add your co-founders to your team so you can all stay on the same page and get legal paperwork done together.

## Run by Startup Attorneys
![photo of chris and darby⟨34⟩].png)
We're not a law firm and we're not your attorney. But we are run by startup attorneys who worked at one of the top startup practices in Silicon Valley.‍Why is this important?We've seen first-hand how problems with legal paperwork can cost startups time and money. Our products are designed to help founders avoid these problems.
Learn more about our story⟨35⟩

generated_description:
### Clerky: Simplifying Legal Paperwork for Startups

**Mission**: Clerky exists to make legal paperwork shockingly simple for startups and their attorneys. This means taking the often tedious and complex tasks associated with legal documentation—from incorporation to fundraising and hiring— and streamlining them into user-friendly software. 

**Overview**:
Founded in 2011 as part of Y Combinator’s S11 batch, Clerky operates out of Palo Alto with a compact team of 15. The focus is not just on paperwork; it aims to ensure that legal processes are handled safely and efficiently, earning the trust of thousands of leading startups in the process. 

**What They Do**:
Clerky offers a suite of services tailored specifically for startups, which includes:
- **Formation**: Simplifying the process of incorporating, especially as a Delaware C corporation, which is the standard for high-growth startups.
- **Fundraising**: Tools like board consents, SAFEs (Simple Agreements for Future Equity), and more for effective fundraising.
- **Hiring**: Templates and guidance for new hire paperwork, including offer letters and NDAs.
- **Commercial Agreements**: Easy-to-use templates for one-way and mutual NDAs.
- **Maintenance**: Ongoing support for things like company name changes and increased authorized shares.

**The Unique Edge**: 
Unlike traditional legal services, Clerky is designed by startup attorneys who understand firsthand the legal pitfalls that can disrupt early-stage ventures. This insider knowledge enables them to craft tools that help founders navigate their companies' legal needs without the headache. 

**Noteworthy Features**:
- **Customizable Legal Documentation**: Startups can tailor key terms in their paperwork to suit their unique needs.
- **Collaborative Interface**: Founders can include lawyers in the process for review and input, ensuring accuracy and compliance.
- **Expert Support**: They combine automated ease with real legal expertise, providing reassurance that documents are not only fast to produce but also legally sound.

**Client Testimonials**:
Clerky is trusted by notable experts and countless successful startups. Partners from prominent law firms praise them for their accuracy and efficiency, often noting how the distinction between using Clerky versus generic services can make or break a startup's legal standing. 

**Pricing**: 
Clerky offers flexible pricing options, including a "pay per use" model starting at $427, and a lifetime package for $819, including incorporation and necessary filings.

**Conclusion**: 
If you're a startup founder wrestling with legal paperwork, Clerky could be your best ally, turning a complex necessity into a seamless experience. Their unique combination of simplicity, expertise, and collaboration can not only save you time and money, but also help you avoid future legal headaches.

**Website**: [Clerky](https://www.clerky.com)

In the end, Clerky is a testament to how technology can transform old industries, making essential processes more accessible and efficient for creators focused on building their futures.
